import './Home.css' import React,{ useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Home() { const dispatch = useDispatch() async function handleLogout() { if (window.confirm("Are you sure logout ")) { await axios.get('/logout') dispatch({ type: "refresh" }) } } const user= useSelector((state)=>state.user) return (

Profile

Name
{user.details.name}
Email
{user.details.email}
Ph
{user.details.phone}
); }; export default Home
